metadata.csv: Metadata of the project, including details about the source, measurement conditions, and reference date.
reportingForm.csv: Reporting form for the project, which needs to be filled out with the results of the measurements and sent to digitalRI@bipm.org.
PMTA_background.csv: Signal (CAEN list-mode format) of the first PMT during the background measurement.
PMTA_source.csv: Signal (CAEN list-mode format) of the first PMT during the source measurement.
PMTB_background.csv: Signal (CAEN list-mode format) of the second PMT during the background measurement.
PMTB_source.csv: Signal (CAEN list-mode format) of the second PMT during the source measurement.
PMTC_background.csv: Signal (CAEN list-mode format) of the third PMT during the background measurement.
PMTC_source.csv: Signal (CAEN list-mode format) of the third PMT during the source measurement.
Gamma_Channel_background.csv: Signal (CAEN list-mode format) of the gamma detector during the background measurement.
Gamma_Channel_source.csv: Signal (CAEN list-mode format) of the gamma detector during the source measurement.
